text: Arthur James Evans (March 27, 1942 â€“ December 21, 2024) was an American actor. He was born in Berkeley, California. His career began in 1972. He was known for his role as Leslie Barnes in the action movie Die Hard 2 (1990). He also appeared in Youngblood (1978), The Cracker Factory (1979), National Lampoon's Class Reunion (1982), Into the Night (1985), Fright Night (1985), Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling (1986), Ruthless People (1986), Native Son (1986), White of the Eye (1987), School Daze (1988), The Mighty Quinn (1989), Downtown (1990), Trespass (1992), CB4 (1993), Bitter Harvest (1993), Tales from the Hood (1995) and Metro (1997).
